Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Hoyne
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Western, 51st, Ashland and 47th, over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Western, 51st, Ashland and 47th, over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains running with significant delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train near LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains running with significant delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train near LaSalle.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

  • Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from O'Hare to Racine, in both directions.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
